Feature: D&D from the desktop â€“ Plug-in files
Description:
Confirm that dragging a helper-application
       file to the browser window opens the file
       properly

Verify that there is a tab for help and you can create a Help
        Sidebar tab with dynamic information

Verify that there is Troubleshooting Help about the problme "if you
        can't see anyone in your buddy list window."

Verify that page up and down, in fact, page up and down in
        help

Verify that you can move around pages with the up and down arrow
        keys
Determine whether What's new in Netscape 6 displays correctly
Clear all of history

Determine that you can right click an image and send it via
        email.

Verify that the process to replace a forgotten master password is
      easier/more discoverable (though encrypted information should still be
      lost to the user who has forgotten their password).

Feature: Save username and password, never for this site
Description:
Verify that the browser behaves correctly after selections are made
      in the save password dialog box

Determine if a page with portrait and Landscape settings prints
        properly
Determine if  top web sites print properly
Determine if Realaudio works properly
Determine if Shockwave movies work properly
Verify that starting a URL bar search triggers the sidebar

Determine whether discontiguous selection of table cells function
        properly.
Check default width of Sidebar
Retaining non-default size on reopen or new window
Verify that nothing changes when you cancel

Determine that interface features (buttons, textfield, droplist)
        appear and behave as expected. Includes tests to dismiss dialog.

Feature: Local file in an editor window
Description:
Open local files (both HTML and plain text tested) in a Composer
        window. Includes tests to dismiss dialog.

Feature: Basic access of Find and Find Again
Description: Access from main menu, keyboard accelerator, access keys.

Find forwards and backwards within a document. Test Find
        Again.
Click and drag thumb to scroll page
Verify correct bookmarks are installed in Bookmarks bar.
